pilot:Pilot_Sprint.NAME: Sprint
pilot:Pilot_Sprint.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Gain !pilot:UrMagic! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

pilot:Titanfall.NAME: Titanfall
pilot:Titanfall.DESCRIPTION: Deploy Titan with !M! pilot:Shields. Gain !pilot:UrMagic! pilot:Protect. NL Add *Chaingun to your draw pile.
pilot:Titanfall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deploy Titan with !M! pilot:Shields. Gain !pilot:UrMagic! pilot:Protect. NL Add *Chaingun to your draw pile.

pilot:Chaingun.NAME: X016A2 Chaingun
pilot:Chaingun.DESCRIPTION: Titan. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! pilot:Protect this turn.

pilot:Kick.NAME: Kick
pilot:Kick.DESCRIPTION: Reflex. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card.

pilot:Flatline.NAME: Flatline
pilot:Flatline.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to a random enemy twice.

pilot:EVA8.NAME: EVA-8
pilot:EVA8.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL pilot:Engage: deal !D! damage to ALL enemies instead.

pilot:DoubleTake.NAME: Double Take
pilot:DoubleTake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have pilot:Advantage, gain [E] .

pilot:Volt.NAME: Volt
pilot:Volt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have pilot:Momentum, gain [E] .

pilot:G2A5.NAME: G2A5
pilot:G2A5.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have pilot:Advantage, gain !M! Dexterity.

pilot:Alternator.NAME: Alternator
pilot:Alternator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. NL If you have pilot:Momentum, Dexterity increases this damage.

pilot:CAR.NAME: CAR
pilot:CAR.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have pilot:Momentum, Dexterity increases this damage.

pilot:BatteryBackUp.NAME: Battery Back-up
pilot:BatteryBackUp.DESCRIPTION: Give your Titan !M! pilot:Shields. NL Exhaust.
pilot:BatteryBackUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Give your Titan !M! pilot:Shields. NL Exhaust.

pilot:WallHang.NAME: Wall Hang
pilot:WallHang.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have pilot:Advantage, lose !M! Dexterity.
